author: Manju Malhi
method: Place the saffron into a cup with the milk and leave it to soak for a couple of minutes Whisk together the yoghurt (or crème fraîche), cream, honey and nutmeg in a separate bowl. Gently stir the milk and saffron into the yoghurt mixture.  To serve, dip the strawberries into the shrikhand.
ingredients: 3-4 saffron strands ,  4 tbsp milk, warmed,  150g/5oz Greek-style yoghurt or low-fat crème fraîche,  1 tbsp cream,  1 tsp clear honey,  pinch ground nutmeg,  punnet of strawberries
